mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT AL.*, CODENAME, M1.MNAME MIDNAME, M2.MNAME FIDNAME FROM ALERT AL, ALERT_CODE AC, MEMBER M1, MEMBER M2 WHERE M1.MID = AL.MID AND AL.FID = M2.MID AND AL.ALCODE = AC.ALCODE AND (AL.MID = #{mid} OR AL.FID = #{mid}) ORDER BY ALDATE DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM ALERT WHERE MID = #{mid} OR FID = #{mid})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM ALERT WHERE (MID = #{mid} OR FID = #{mid}) AND ALCHECK = 0)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALERT (ALNO, MID, FID, ALCODE) VALUES (ALERT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mid}, #{fid}, #{alcode})
mapper.update: UPDATE ALERT SET ALCHECK = 1 WHERE ALNO = #{alno} AND ALCHECK = 0
